Posts.Content: I am still on chemo I have one more treatment but yes I am having pain in my butt, legs all the way down to my feet. It feels like my legs are numb at times- if I have it itch I can’t feel my self scratching it. I can’t sleep on my left side or right side so I am tossing and turning all night long I hope this goes away after my last treatment if that point I will start radiation so hoping it will not continue. I feel better when I’m walking then sitting or laying down. Ugh!
Posts.Title: leg and knee pain during chemo
